content: So what youâre seeing there is, both an increase in volume and a substantial increase in mix of volume as a result of our Range Rover and Range Rover Sport vehicles now being presented to the marketplace, thatâs driven an EBIT positive in the quarter for the first time in those comparative two quarters, substantial improvement of more than 5 percentage points. Back to you, Balaji. Back to you, Balaji. And therefore, you may see a change as a counterweight to that I think Iâve already answered, we are going to start to lift some of those costs and some of those expenditures and, of course you know the inflationary pressures in the second half of the year, particularly on employee settlements will start to come in place to lift the cost as well.
